entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon.
